actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Shipping Act, 1916, in order to provide that a State, the District of Columbia, the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico, and a territory or possession of the United States shall be considered a citizen of the United States for the purpose of such Act.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Amends the Shipping Act, 1916, to stipulate that a State, the District of Columbia, the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico, or a territory or possession of the United States shall be deemed a "citizen of the United States" for purposes of such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Shipping Act, 1916, in order to provide that a State, the District of Columbia, the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico, and a territory or possession of the United States shall be considered a citizen of the United States for the purpose of such Act.
